description: the Department of National Defence (DND) requires the supply, delivery, and set-up of one (1) Motorized Trailer Dolly to 3 CDSB Wainwright Maintenance Section located at Denwood Alberta as per Annex A of the solicitation.
full_summary:
# W168A-22MK07 Motorized Trailer Dolly Tender

## Solicitation Details

* **Publication Date**: September 15, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 24, 2022, at 14:00 EST
* **Amendment Date**: November 21, 2022
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: September 30, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date**: April 1, 2023

## Tender Specifications

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites bids for the supply, delivery, and set-up of one (1) Motorized Trailer Dolly to 3 CDSB Wainwright Maintenance Section located at Denwood, Alberta.

## Key Requirements

* The Motorized Trailer Dolly must be delivered and set-up in accordance with the requirements outlined in Annex A of the solicitation.
* A preference for Canadian goods is applicable for this tender.

## Tender Status

This tender has expired. Please note that all bids submitted after November 24, 2022, at 14:00 EST will be considered non-responsive.

## Contact Information

* **Name**: Erin Kaiser (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [erin.kaiser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:erin.kaiser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: N/A
* **Fax**: N/A

## Contracting Entity

The contracting entity for this tender is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

## Notice URL

The notice for this tender can be found at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14002999?extsite=MTQwMDI5OTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14002999?extsite=MTQwMDI5OTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
